trans-unit.source: Provides a set of <see langword="static" /> methods that extend the <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> class.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> 클래스를 확장하는 <see langword="static" /> 메서드 집합을 제공합니다.

trans-unit.source: The methods in this class are defined as extension methods that extend the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> class.
trans-unit.target: 이 클래스의 메서드는을 확장 하는 확장 메서드로 정의 <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: This means that they can be called like an instance method on any <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> object.
trans-unit.target: 즉,는 호출할 수 있습니다 인스턴스 메서드처럼에서 <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The methods in this class operate on <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> objects that are associated with a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> object.
trans-unit.target: 이 클래스의 메서드는 작업할 <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> 연관 된 개체는 <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Waits for the underlying <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation" /> to complete.
The <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation" />.
Waits indefinitely for the underlying <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation" /> to complete.
The status of the underlying <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation" />.

Call the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.TaskExtensions.IsDispatcherOperationTask%2A> method to check whether the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> is associated with a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation> before you call this method.
trans-unit.target: 호출는 <xref:System.Windows.Threading.TaskExtensions.IsDispatcherOperationTask%2A> 검사 하도록 여부는 <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> 연결 된는 <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation> 이 메서드를 호출 하기 전에.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> is not associated with a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation" />.
The amount of time to wait.
Waits for the specified amount of time for the underlying <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation" /> to complete.
trans-unit.target: 그런 다음 지정된 시간 동안 기본 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation" />이 완료되기를 기다립니다.

trans-unit.source: The status of the underlying <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation" />.

Call the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.TaskExtensions.IsDispatcherOperationTask%2A> method to check whether the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> is associated with a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation> before you call this method.
trans-unit.target: 호출는 <xref:System.Windows.Threading.TaskExtensions.IsDispatcherOperationTask%2A> 검사 하도록 여부는 <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> 연결 된는 <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation> 이 메서드를 호출 하기 전에.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> is not associated with a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> to check.
Returns a value that indicates whether this <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> is associated with a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation" />.
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" />가 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation" />과 연결되어 있는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: The status of the underlying <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation" />.
`true` if the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> is associated with a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation>; otherwise, `false`.
trans-unit.target: `true` 경우는 <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> 연결 된 한 <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation>, 그렇지 않으면 `false`합니다.
